title: My league won't open
body: I click on the launcher but it IMMEDIATELY doesn't respond.

replies.body: The patcher needs permission from your OS to allow it to launch.  If your patcher isn't launching at all, our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide will provide some steps to adjust your settings to allow access.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any questions!
